metadata.title: CVE-2024-42308 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Check for NULL pointer[why & how]Need to make sure plane_state is initializedbefore accessing its members.(cherry picked from commit 295d91cbc700651782a60572f83c24861607b648)

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
